title: Kāmasūtra: What It Is (And What It Isn't)
content:
## Summary
The Kāmasūtra is often misunderstood as only a ‘sex manual’. In context, it is a broader text about pleasure (kāma) as one part of a balanced life, alongside ethics (dharma) and wellbeing.

## Key points
- Culture & history context, not explicit content
- Emphasize mutual respect and consent
- Modern wellbeing framing
